definitions: A piece of coarse material placed on a floor for people to wipe their feet on.
A piece of thick or resilient material for lying on or for landing on in gymnastics, wrestling, or similar sports.
A piece of coarse material for lying on.
A small piece of cork, card, or fabric placed on a table or other surface to protect it from the heat or moisture of an object placed on it.
A thick, untidy layer of something hairy or woolly.
